establishments.name: The Roasted Spirit
establishments.description: Elevated spirits bar with the largest selection of sipping spirits in Clermont. Features scratch kitchen sharable tapas, small plates, and brunch on Sundays.

establishments.name: Black Bear Kitchen
establishments.description: BBQ restaurant serving brisket, pulled pork, chicken, turkey, and salmon with various BBQ sauces including Latin BBQ and FL Citrus BBQ.

establishments.name: Clermont Brewing Company
establishments.description: Craft brewery with on-site brewing, thin crust Neapolitan pizzas, gourmet salads, and live entertainment. Features three dining areas: indoor farmhouse dining, covered patio, and beer garden.

establishments.name: Salt Shack on the Lake
establishments.description: Rustic-refined waterfront restaurant on Lake Minneola offering gulf-to-table seafood with Caribbean-inspired menu and casual beachfront bar scene.

establishments.name: Pepe's Cantina
establishments.description: Vibrant Mexican restaurant offering authentic Mexican ingredients with innovative culinary techniques. Features tableside guacamole and full bar.

establishments.name: Root & Branch Bistro + Bar
establishments.description: Upscale casual dining restaurant with scratch-made cuisine and crafted cocktails. Multiple award winner including 'Best of South Lake for Dinner'.
awards: Best of South Lake for Dinner (4 times)

excluded_establishments.name: The View at Clermont National
excluded_establishments.reason: Outside quarter-mile radius - located at golf course

notes.methodology: Distances estimated based on street addresses and downtown Clermont layout. Quarter-mile radius includes establishments within approximately 1,320 feet of the central location.
notes.limitations: Exact GPS coordinates not available for all establishments. Some smaller bars or restaurants may not have been captured in search results.
